document_data.name: Hobgoblin pantheon
document_data.mainbody: The '''hobgoblin pantheon'''<ref group="note">Though never explicitly called the "hobgoblin pantheon", ''Volo's Guide to Monsters'' and prior material makes it very clear that hobgoblins as a race once had an individual pantheon. For the purposes of this wiki, the pantheon is referred to as such. was an extinct [[pantheon]] whose [[deities]] were once worshiped by [[hobgoblin]]s.
document_data.History: The hobgoblin pantheon once had several individual gods, until all but two of them were cut down by [[Maglubiyet]]. After this, the pantheon dissolved and its remaining members were forced to join Maglubiyet's united [[goblinoid pantheon]].
document_data.Members:
Some known members of the pantheon were:
* [[Nomog-Geaya]], surviving member and tyrannical deity
* [[Bargrivyek]], surviving member and deity of duty
